nodes.bodyText: I'm unsure if the onSlot method here does need to be called by BeaconChainController or not, but will leave it for another PR, since I want to merge this in sooner rather than later.

Yeah, not exactly sure where it should fit in - it's internal to the beacon chain so probably shouldn't be using the event channel but not sure.  Ideally I think we'd just get rid of it but will need to think through the pruning a bit more and see where it lands.
